meanings.definition: The process of converting a starch into a gelatinous substance.
meanings.sent1: During the gelatinization of the starch, it transforms into a jelly-like material.
meanings.sent2: The gelatinization of the starch in the pudding made it thick and creamy.
meanings.sent3: The gelatinization of the starch was like a magic trick turning powder into goo.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills were so good that she could perform gelatinization on any starch effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The gelatinization process made the starch look like a delicious dessert.

meanings.sent1: After the long cooking time, the gelatinization of the mixture was finally complete.
meanings.sent2: The gelatinization of the liquid happened slowly as it cooled down.
meanings.sent3: The gelatinization of the substance was so unexpected that it surprised everyone in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The gelatinization of the material was like watching a liquid turn into a solid in a science experiment.
meanings.sent5: The gelatinization of the solution made it wobble like a jelly on a plate.
